title: Problem 2108_C
statement: Neo wants to escape from the Matrix. In front of him are n buttons arranged in a row. Each button has a weight given by an integer: a_1, a_2, ..., a_n.Neo is immobilized, but he can create and move clones. This means he can perform an unlimited number of actions of the following two types in any order: Create a clone in front of a specific button.
